name: Nica Rustica - Connecticut Broadleaf - Short Robusto
additionalNotes:
Nicaraguan cigarmaker Drew Estate has introduced Nica Rustica Adobe, the newest line extension to its budget-friendly Nica Rustica brand. The unveiling happened late last week on Drew Estate’s Freestyle Live event, which streamed on social media via YouTube and Facebook Live. Retailers can expect 
The cigars are rolled with a Ecuador Habano wrapper, a Brazilian binder and Nicaraguan fillers from the Estelí and Jalapa regions. According to the company, Nica Rustica Adobe is medium-to-full in body.
